TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 121-122
TEI.2.document_title: Mills M Battle to Stephen F Austin, 10-01-1828

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin in account with Mills M. Battle, October 1, 1828. For carpentering, labor, and supplies.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 121-122

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin in account with Mills M. Battle, October 1, 1828. For carpentering, labor, and supplies.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* to *person_mentioned*Mills M Battle*/person_mentioned* Dr.*/p* *p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1826">1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**date_mentioned n="12-xx-1826">Decr. */date_mentioned* Repairs on yr *location_mentioned*House */location_mentioned*for a Ball, and Stools----------- $2.*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1827">1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-27-1827">Jany 27 */date_mentioned* Mounting Cannon for *location_mentioned*Nacogdoche Camp*/location_mentioned*--------------------- 6*/p*
*p*7 Bushels Corn Loaned *person_mentioned*John Austin*/person_mentioned*___________________ 7*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-07-1827">Octr 27*/date_mentioned* 5 days work *person_mentioned*Mr. King*/person_mentioned* Hawling Timber___________________ 5*/p*
*p*Boarding the same 75 cts pr day________________________ 3.75*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="11-17-1827">Novr 17*/date_mentioned* to 5 days hoarding of Woods and Ewing while a Hawling*/p*
*p*Timber at 75 cts_____________________________________ 3. 75*/p*
*p*1 pair Shoes for *person_mentioned*Shepherd Boy*/person_mentioned*__________________________ 1*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1828">1828*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="02-10-1827">Feby 10 */date_mentioned* Making a Desk and Work for the *person_mentioned*Secretary*/person_mentioned*_____________ 5*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-09-1827">May 9*/date_mentioned* Removing the *location_mentioned*Westall House*/location_mentioned*____________________________ 10*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-011828">October 1 */date_mentioned*Building yr *location_mentioned*House */location_mentioned*pr Contract__________.________________ 600*/p*
*p*Hewing 325 feet of Joice over and above the Contract at 5cts_____________________________________________ 16.20*/p*
*p*Making 4 windows for Gable Ends of your *location_mentioned*House */location_mentioned*at $2.00-------------8*/p*
*p*$667. 70*/p* *p*Deduct $50—for not finishing the house -------------- $50*/p*
*p*617. 70*/p*
*p* Cash____________________________________________$200 $200*/p*
*p*paid ______ ________________________________ 174.57 1/3*/p*
*p*25. 42 12/3*/p* *p*8. 33 1/3*/p*
*p*deduct cash proportion of 50 Dollars for not finishing.------------------------------------------17. 09 1/3 in cash due*/p*
*p*Property------------------------------------------467.70 467.70*/p*
*p*paid----------------------------------------------272.41 2/3 667.70*/p*
*p*195. 28 1/3*/p* *p*deduct trade part of 50 dollars for not finishing----------- 41. 66 2/3*/p*
*p*153.61 2/3 trade due*/p*
*p*Tell *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*to send down the cross cut saw and the size of the window so as to make the Shutter*/p*
*/div1*
